title: Who is your favorite Waifu and why?
body:
My favorite is Honoka Kousaka
because she is a cute high schooler, and I like my waifus to be in high school. 

Does this mean she's a loli? No. 
Does this make me a %%%%? No. Cuz I'm not an old man
And also cuz she's cute as f-  10/10 

http://imgur.com/EV18VmZ
